title.rendered: “IDF Forces Dismantle Terrorists’ Homes & Arrest Six Wanted Individuals in Judea and Samaria: An Inside Look”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF forces destroyed the houses of the terrorists who carried out the attack in Ra’anana in which Edna Blushtein was murdered, may her memory be a blessing; IDF, ISA and Border Police forces operated last night to arrest six wanted individuals across Judea and Samaria.

IDF, Border Police and ISA forces demolished last night in the village of Bani Naim the houses of the terrorists Mahmoud Ali Zayadat and Ahmed Mohammed Zayadat, who carried out the attack in Ra’anana on 15.1.2024 in which Edna Blushtein was murdered, may her memory be a blessing, and about twenty additional citizens were injured of various degrees. In addition, the soldiers investigated additional suspects in the area.

In parallel, IDF, ISA and Border Police forces operated last night to arrest six wanted individuals across Judea and Samaria.

The soldiers arrested two wanted individuals in the village of Azzira Kabalia in the Samaria Brigade and two more wanted individuals in the village of Akraba. A wanted individual was arrested in Hawara and another wanted individual was arrested by the forces in Tzur in the Samaria Brigade.

The arrested individuals were transferred for further investigation by the security forces, there were no casualties to our forces.

So far since the beginning of the war, about 3,850 wanted individuals have been arrested across the Judea and Samaria Division and in the Jordan Valley and the Valleys Brigade, about 1,650 of them are affiliated with the Hamas terror organization.

Attached is documentation of the demolition of the terrorists’ houses last night: https://bit.ly/3vXoF1m

Attached are pictures from the forces’ activity across Judea and Samaria: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC17042024732452
